Pada usia lapan tahun, Arda ditangkap oleh penyembah syaitan yang kuat. Kakak Arda, Nihal, melakukan yang terbaik untuk menyelamatkan abangnya daripada masalah ini, tetapi dia tidak dapat mencapai sebarang keputusan.

programme.title: You Saka.. Pergi Jauh Jauh Ep4
programme.desc: Episod ke 4 antara lain memaparkan Nia yang baru bangun pagi kelihatan gelisah akibat mimpi tuan puteri ingin memberikannya sekuntum bunga dan dia menceritakan kepada Shasa. Shasa hanya menyatakan kerana Nia terbawa-bawa dan memikirkan yang dia alami. Sementara itu, Pak Abas dan Roslan bercakap tentang arwah Rosserita. Di pejabat, Nia diganggui oleh saka Gelam. Manakala di rumah dia terserempak depan berdepan dengan lembaga putih berdialog dan memberi amaran kepadanya. Kemudiannnya menceritakan pengalamannya bahawa lembaga putih itu menyerupai emaknya. Manakala Fauzan dengan ibunya bertengkar kerana ibunya bercadang untuk menghantar ke hospital gila. Ini berikutan Fauzan bercakap dengan seseorang kononnya berada di atas bangku disebelahnya.

programme.title: Sangkar
programme.desc: Adam dan Johan merupakan atlet sukan bela diri campuran (MMA). Adam bersikap angkuh dan telah menang sebuah pertarungan dengan taktik kotornya. Mereka ialah musuh dan selalu bersaing. Suatu hari, apabila dicabar di luar sangkar, Adam secara tidak sengaja mencederakan Johan. Johan tercedera parah dan ahli keluarganya hilang punca rezeki dan harapan. Untuk menebus kesalahannya, Adam kembali bertarung di pertarungan bawah tanah untuk mendapatkan habuan supaya dapat membantu Johan sekeluarga. Johan pula sedang bertarung dengan kesihatan dan pemulihan demi keluarganya. Pada saat ini, Adam mengingatkan tujuan diri sebagai pejuang MMA dan mengambil cabaran untuk berlawan dengan pejuang MMA antarabangsa.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep18
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan menjadi bodyguard kepada Kamal, dia terperanjat bila mendapati Salina teman wanitanya juga berkawan dengan Kamal. Kamal adalah bapa tiri kepada Shamsul. Farish menjadi bodyguard kepada Shamsul, mereka terperanjat apabila menjumpai Kamal bersama-sama dengan Salina. Shamsul mengambil gambar Kamal dan Salina, gambar ini dihantar kepada emaknya. Pada yang sama Kamal syak Ryan mempunyai hubungan dengan Salina. Dia meminta Nasha menukarkan bodyguard Ryan dengan Bakri. Dalam kes berasingan, Sarrah bergaduh dengan Taufik yang terlalu kuat cemburu. Bagaimanapun Taufik pandai memujuk, Sarrah akhirnya bersetuju dengan permintaan Taufik supaya perkhidmatan bodyguardnya Bakri dihentikan. Seorang Dato telah datang meminta Nasha menyiasat latar belakang teman wanitanya yang disyaki mempunyai teman lelaki lain.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs 3
programme.desc: Beberapa bulan selepas peristiwa filem asal, Ming mengesyaki seorang penguasa polis sebagai pelanduk baru bagi triad, manakala beberapa tahun sebelum itu, Yan memulakan misi pertamanya.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Tiket Cinta
programme.desc: Khai pernah menaruh hati terhadap Cik Lin di universiti. Perasaan sayang itu lenyap dalam sekelip mata apabila Cik Lin telah menghilangkan diri sewaktu Khai ingin melakukan pembedahan mata.

programme.title: Tmo Cuti Cuti Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Cuti Cuti Cinta

programme.title: Cinta Bersegi-Segi
programme.desc: Zin Ruby dan Ana dahulunya adalah teman rapat semasa zaman persekolahan. Tamat persekolahan mereka bertembung semula di sebuah pusat karaoke apabila masing-masing sudah berpuluh tahun tidak bertemu.

programme.title: Haloba
programme.desc: Mikael dan isterinya Ayu hidup dalam kesederhanaan. Mikael yang bertemu dengan kawan lama dam mereka rancak menceritakan tentang kemewahan masing-masing. Mikael mula memikirkan tentang cara untuk mengubah hidup mereka sekeluarga.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: The Breakup Playlist
programme.desc: Kisah tentang penyanyi profesional yang bercita-cita tinggi dan penyanyi rock yang bekerjasama dalam sebuah lagu. Dalam pada mereka mengerjakan lagu mereka, mereka mula sedar yang mereka suka satu sama lain.

programme.title: Menantu Second Class
programme.desc: Fatin dilayan bagaikan menantu 'second class' oleh ibu mertuanya, Mak Leha. Fatin terperangkap di dapur, memasak dan membasuh pinggan mangkuk. Sedangkan dua menantu perempuan lain, bergaya bagakan ratu cantik dan bersembang dengan gembiranya.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie III
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.desc: Kintang Kintung, seorang pelumba jalanan haram yang sentiasa menang dalam perlumbaan di jalanan. Satu malam ketika sedang berlumba, dia secara tidak sengaja telah melanggar seorang gadis, menyebabkan kematian gadis itu. Ini menyebabkan dia berehat seketika daripada berlumba akibat trauma. Traumanya semakin teruk apabila dia mula mengalami gangguan paranormal.

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Bike Boyz
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki ingin membantu seorang wanita mencari suaminya yang telah hilang di kota Bandung, Indonesia. Beliau turut membantu seorang pemuda mendapatkan semula basikal yang dilarikan olehsindiketmencuri basikal.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Rectoversa
programme.desc: penceritaan dari lima buah kisah merangkumi MALAIKAT JUGA TAHU, 'FIRASAT', CURHAT BUAT SAHABAT', CICAK DIDINDING dan HANYA ISYARAT.

programme.title: Tmo Salam Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Salam Cinta

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: penyeludupan kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh. Azri yang gemar bermain alat kawalan tersebut menggunakan kepintarannya dengan mengubah suai mesin terbang itu. Apabila dia melekatkan kamera pegun di kapal terbangnya yang akan mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat, banyak gambar keadaan sekeliling yang tidak dapat dilihat dan tersembunyi ditemui. Ini termasuklah gambar yang amat mencurigakan. Azri dan rakannya Leman yang musykil dengan gambar itu mula menyiasat dan turut dibantu oleh Irin.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Seorang graduan Universiti bekerja sebagai budak pejabat. Suatu hari berlaku krisis antara beberapa majikan di pejabatnya. Budak pejabat itu perlu segera mencari jalan untuk menyelesaikan masalah dan dalam proses itu hampir membahayakan nyawanya sendiri. Dengan bantuan rakan sebiliknya, seekor monyet, dia berjaya mengatasi banyak masalah dan berjaya menyelamatkan pekerjaannya

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Tabrak Cintaku Dijalan Jangan Diperasaan
programme.desc: Ihsan diterima bekerja sebagai pemandu dan juga sebagai pengawal peribadi untuk Tasya. Tetapi mengapa Tasya tidak mahu memiliki pengawal peribadi seperti Ihsan?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep171
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep13
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta Ep4
programme.desc: Tidak mempunyai darah yang sama di tubuh biasanya merupakan sesuatu yang menakutkan bagi anak tiri. Tetapi tidak dengan kejadian yang satu ini, anak tirinya dan isterinya yang meragut nyawa ibu tiri mereka.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep130
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep165
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Pacar Bohongannya Sudah Mulai Aktif Ya Bund
programme.desc: Ken yang masih belum boleh teruskan tanpa Gea kecewa kerana Gea memberikan jemputan perkahwinannya dengan Wisnu, sepupunya. Ken yang cemburu berjanji untuk menghadiri majlis perkahwinan dengan teman wanitanya. Ken akhirnya bertemu dengan Dira atas saranan Dendi, kawan baiknya yang terkenal sebagai broker.

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep11
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep31
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep6
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta Ep5

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep131

programme.desc: Memory of China is the first history program of China, the TV program unveils secrets of important historical events, mega projects and the untold stories behind those crucial decisions of this country.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep234
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Eye of the Rift
programme.desc: The program is based on precious animal videos shot by infrared cameras and remote cameras deployed in tens of thousands of protected areas in China.

programme.title: Eye of the Rift
programme.desc: The program is based on precious animal videos shot by infrared cameras and remote cameras deployed in tens of thousands of protected areas in China.

programme.title: Jue Sheng Ling Ju Li Ep7
programme.desc: In a military Drill, captain He Tiangao and Chai Shenghua, lead Xiaowolf Special Forces bravely attacked two tough gated, and a passionate story of fighting against foreign terrorist forces who tried to sabotage the exercise.

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep168
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep460
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep60
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep12
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep857858
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep684
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3385
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46834684
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep111112
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1839
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2076
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep958
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Office politics and love between co-workers complicates the lives of two computer-company employees in this romantic comedy starring Andy Lau and Sammi Cheng.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In 2004, 10 months after the murder of Yan, Ming is transferred to do menial police work. Meanwhile, a new star Wing has emerged in the police force. Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring that his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nations Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kongs Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: A rare directorial foray for acclaimed martial arts choreographer Tang Chia, Shaolin Intruders is an entertaining amalgamation of eye-popping martial arts and thrilling detective story. On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chin Hu Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua (Liu Yu-po) his friend Lei Hsin (Derek Yee) was determined to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realized the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What followed is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villainThe film is filled with jaw-dropping action sequences developed by Tang and six leading choreographers of the era. Scenes including the "Blade Array", "Twelve Vajrayana Array" and the acclaimed "Stool Array" are all lauded as the defining Chinese screen gems, for their insane complexity and lightning speed.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Heaven And Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Rummy
programme.desc: Indian Tamil romantic thriller film starring Inigo Prabhakaran, Gayathrie, Vijay Sethupathi and Iyshwarya Rajesh

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Oru Naal Koothu
programme.desc: Oru Naal Koothu features Actor Dinesh, Karunakaran, Mia George. It revolves around 3 women who want to get hitched, but they are notable to for their own reasons. While few people have the luxury to select a perfect bride/groom, for many it does not happen. The difficulties while deciding to get married and its consequence forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Muganis ascience fiction action thriller filmwritten and directed byAnand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: An idealistic young lawyer, taking on the case of an indigent family whose son is denied medical care by a powerful insurance company and dies, uncovers a multi-billion dollar insurance scam.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony

programme.desc: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Rice Pudding - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out what it takes for a factory to churn out 360,000 cans of rice pudding every day.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 1 - An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. In its path are the homes of seven thousand residents and the emergency services rush to evacuate. Within twenty-four hours, volcano expert Chris Horsley is on the scene.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Yukon - The Yukon is a river of beauty and dangerous extremes - a place where the 'call of the wild' is still strong. Home to grizzlies, moose and salmon, it lies at the heart of a vast northern wilderness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Rice Pudding - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out what it takes for a factory to churn out 360,000 cans of rice pudding every day.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep1
programme.desc: West Coast - Maritime archaeologist Matt Carter explores the West Coast's treacherous sea-faring history, while Scottish historian and archaeologist Neil Oliver discovers a secret beach and goes out on a limb on coastal cliffs.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Rice Pudding - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out what it takes for a factory to churn out 360,000 cans of rice pudding every day.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep7
programme.desc: It takes 80,000 apples to produce a single batch of fruit leather; discover the secret to making squeaky cheese curds; Hello Dolly bars are getting a vegan encore; and there's a fun-loving pit crew behind every tub of a Canadian guacamole.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep8
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Colourful Planet - From space Earth is a kaleidoscope. Turquoise plankton blooms trigger a feeding frenzy, China turns yellow with rapeseed flowers, and mysterious green lights appear in the ocean.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep6
programme.desc: New Zealand - Joel and Nish join a gang of sheep shearers in New Zealand. It's the ultimate work hard play hard lifestyle but can the boys handle both the jobs and the alcohol?

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to Brazil.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Brink of Winter - Sue Aikens must hunt for caribou before they disappear from the tundra. Jessie Holmes scouts his new land for future hunting grounds.

programme.desc: A single sturgeon can produce a bowl of sustainable caviar worth $12,000; a shepherd's pie puts a modern twist on Mom's classic recipe; a family business rolls out nine million risotto balls every year; and discover the secret to making decadent ice wine truffles.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep10
programme.desc: See how the cheese met the peanut butter in this legendary sandwich snack; get the scoop on two-toned frozen fruit bars from Florida; 1.5 million blueberry dumplings are produced in just one shift; and it takes a mountain of super-food to make tantalizing kale chips.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Alaska: Last American Frontier - In southeast Alaska, there's an ice-bound Eden that harbors possibly the richest temperate rainforests of all.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Former footballer Les Ferdinand is coerced into the North Sea in a wetsuit as he joins Robson Green on a short break in Northumberland packed with memories and laughter.

programme.desc: Robson and road trip buddy, actor Mark Benton, go on a humour-filled quest to find ways to relax while exploring the North Yorkshire coast.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Life and Death - Ricko DeWilde races against the freeze to fortify the family cabin. The Hailstones scout the land for seasonal resources. Sue Aikens must repair vital safety equipment before tundra storms arrive.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sun - From the frozen poles to the searing deserts, The Sun shows how animals have come up with strategies to survive the uneven amounts of sunlight that fall on our planet.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: India - Joanna follows the Spice Trail to India.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep3
programme.desc: Taking Chances - Andy Bassich and Denise Becker attempt a harvest that isn't usually available this time of year. Iriqtaiq Hailstone sets out to help her sisters and to teach her son a native skill.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Masked Bandits - Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Fires of Pele - The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Life Among Trees - How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And whats it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter is Coming - As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the Peaks - The air is thin and cold, trees cant even live here - its not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. Well take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether its head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they dont, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meadow of Horror - It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow but full of monsters.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - This episode follows the seasonal eb and flow of the Mekong through Cambodia - a nation where everything has a special relationship with water. From Cambodias diverse wildlife to people living in the stilt villages of lake Tonle Sap, the Mekong has dictated the lives of everything that lives there for centuries.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years that can withstand the harshest conditions and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any otherthe enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.
